definition: to send one's greetings/to send best regards/to devote attention to
to send/to devote/to deliver/to cause/to convey
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: Janice evaded Minmei's embrace, and nodded coolly.
sentences.chinese: 賈妮斯避開了她的擁抱禮，冷淡地點點頭致意。
她咧嘴笑着，並揮手致意。

sentences.english: He and Lentil kiss each other on the cheek.
sentences.chinese: 他和蘭緹互吻臉頰致意。

sentences.english: An old man at the counter nodded in greeting when he saw Walter.
sentences.chinese: 櫃檯後面有一個老頭看見瓦爾特進來向他點頭致意。

sentences.english: That committee could not reach an agreement on this issue.
sentences.chinese: 那個委員會沒能就這個問題達成一致意見。

sentences.english: The groom walks between two rows of guardsmen.
sentences.chinese: “衛兵”們分列兩行，向新郎致意。

sentences.english: People gathered along the train route to wave to the President-elect.
sentences.chinese: 人們聚集在鐵路沿線像候選總統揮手致意。

sentences.english: And we agree on a process to tackle tax reform and entitlement reform.
sentences.chinese: 而且對如何應對稅改和權利改革取得了一致意見。

sentences.english: "It is a hat for salutes, " the conceited man replied.
sentences.chinese: 這是爲了向人致意用的。

sentences.english: As Iapproached him, he gave me anod of greeting.
sentences.chinese: 當我走近他時，他向我點頭致意。

sentences.english: She greeted him with a smile.
Please give my love to your sister.
The members couldn't come to an agreement. They were at sixes and sevens.
sentences.chinese: 委員們不能達成一致意見，他們各持己見。

sentences.english: Revise the goals until all parties agree on them and understand them.
sentences.chinese: 修訂目標，直到各方理解他們，並對此達成一致意見。

sentences.english: The man nodded courteously and walked past.
sentences.chinese: 長者禮貌地朝我們點頭致意，然後就走開了。

definition: to say hello to/to send one's regards to
to return a greeting/to send a gift in return
expression of gratitude/to give thanks/a thank-you note/acknowledgement
to return a politeness/to present a gift in return
to greet sb by word or action/to give prior notice
to toast sb (with wine etc)/to drink a toast
